1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Attribute editor.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.AttrEd
6  ( AttrEd, AttrEdBody (..),
7    consAttrEd, runAttrEd,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol          as S
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token           as S
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Tree            as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.AttrName   as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.Slot       as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern         as P
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message           as Msg
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.Message    as Msg
19
20
21-- ----------------------  Data type
22
23-- | Attribute editor with source code information.
24type AttrEd = B.Codic AttrEdBody
25
26-- | Operators for attribute editors.
27data AttrEdBody
28    = AttrEdId                            -- ^ __id:__ Identity editor
29    | AttrEdAdd     Bool String [S.Tree]  -- ^ __add:__ Add attribute
30    | AttrEdRename  (String, String)      -- ^ __rename:__ Rename attribute keyword
31    | AttrEdFill    [Maybe S.Tree]        -- ^ __fill:__ Fill positional attributes
32    | AttrEdNest    String [S.Tree]       -- ^ __nest:__ Nested relation reference
33    | AttrEdAppend  [AttrEd]              -- ^ Append editors
34      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
35
36
37-- ----------------------  Cons and run
38
39-- | Construct attribute editor.
40consAttrEd :: [S.Tree] -> B.Ab AttrEd
41consAttrEd = loop where
42    notKeyword ('-' : _)  = False
43    notKeyword _          = True
44
45    fill (P.LRaw "*" : xs) = Nothing : fill xs
46    fill (x : xs)          = Just x  : fill xs
47    fill []                = []
48
49    right :: [S.Tree] -> AttrEdBody -> B.Ab AttrEd
50    right trees = Right . B.codic trees
51
52    loop trees =
53        Msg.abAttrTrees trees $ case S.divideTreesByBar trees of
54          [P.LRaw op : xs]
55            | op == "id"      -> right trees $ AttrEdId
56            | op == "fill"    -> right trees $ AttrEdFill $ fill xs
57
58          [P.LRaw op : P.LRaw ('-' : k) : xs]
59            | op == "add"     -> right trees $ AttrEdAdd False k xs
60            | op == "opt"     -> right trees $ AttrEdAdd True  k xs
61            | op == "nest"    -> right trees $ AttrEdNest k xs
62
63          [P.LRaw op : P.LRaw k' : P.LRaw k : _]
64            | notKeyword k'   -> Msg.reqAttrName k'
65            | notKeyword k    -> Msg.reqAttrName k
66            | op == "rename"  -> right trees $ AttrEdRename (k', k)
67
68          [[P.BGroup xs]]     -> loop xs
69
70          [[]]                -> right [] AttrEdId
71          [_]                 -> Msg.adlib "unknown attribute editor"
72          trees2              -> do subs <- mapM loop trees2
73                                    right trees $ AttrEdAppend subs
74
75-- | Edit relmap attributes.
76runAttrEd :: AttrEd -> B.AbMap [S.AttrTree]
77runAttrEd (B.Codic cp edit) attr = run where
78    run = Msg.abAttr cp $ case edit of
79            AttrEdId                -> Right attr
80            AttrEdAdd opt k xs      -> add opt (S.AttrNormal k) xs
81            AttrEdRename (k', k)    -> rename (S.AttrNormal k') (S.AttrNormal k)
82            AttrEdFill xs           -> do xs2 <- fill pos xs
83                                          Right $ (S.attrNameTrunk, xs2) : attr
84            AttrEdNest  k xs        -> nest (S.AttrNormal k) xs
85            AttrEdAppend rs         -> B.foldM (flip runAttrEd) attr rs
86
87    Just pos = lookup S.attrNameTrunk attr
88
89    add opt k xs = case lookup k attr of
90                     Just _ | opt           -> Right attr
91                            | otherwise     -> Msg.extraAttr
92                     Nothing                -> do xs' <- S.substSlot [] attr xs
93                                                  Right $ (k, xs') : attr
94
95    nest k xs = do xs' <- S.substSlot [] attr xs
96                   n   <- nestName xs'
97                   Right $ (k, n) : attr
98
99    rename :: S.AttrName -> S.AttrName -> B.Ab [S.AttrTree]
100    rename k' k = case lookup k attr of
101          Just _   -> Right $ B.assocRename1 k' k attr
102          Nothing  -> Msg.reqAttr $ S.attrNameText k
103
104    fill :: [S.Tree] -> [Maybe S.Tree] -> B.Ab [S.Tree]
105    fill (p : ps) (Nothing : xs)   = Right . (p:) =<< fill ps xs
106    fill (p : ps) (_       : xs)   = Right . (p:) =<< fill ps xs
107    fill []       (Just x  : xs)   = Right . (x:) =<< fill [] xs
108    fill []       (Nothing : _ )   = Msg.reqAttr "*"
109    fill ps       []               = Right $ ps
110
111nestName :: B.AbMap [S.Tree]
112nestName [P.LTerm n] = Right $ localNest $ S.toTermName n
113nestName _ = Msg.adlib "require term name"
114
115localNest :: S.TermName -> [S.Tree]
116localNest n = [B.TreeL $ S.TLocal B.def (S.LocalNest n) (-1) []]
